Row.Text: All units gain ocean navigation capability as they can get on board.[NEWLINE]Gain one free builder at the beginning of each new era.[NEWLINE] +1 [ICON_Culture] Culture and +1 [ICON_Science] Science from coast and ocean.
When they eliminate a unit, they heal up to 50 hit points.[NEWLINE]Allows coastal raiding for all naval melee units.
Allows coastal raiding for all naval melee units.[NEWLINE]Holy Site and Harbor districts in half the time.[NEWLINE]Builders receive an additional charge.

A building unique to Peoples of the Sea. +25% combat experience for all naval units trained in this city. Bonus [ICON_Production] Production equal to the adjacency bonus of the Harbor district. +2 [ICON_Science] Science, +1 [ICON_Housing] Housing. +2 [ICON_GreatAdmiral] great admiral points per turn.
Peoples of the Sea unique building: Imperial Navy Yard

Unlocks the Builder ability to construct a House Boat, unique to Sea of the Peoples.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_Gold] Gold, [ICON_Production] Production and +1 [ICON_Housing] Housing. Can be built on Coasts and Oceans.
Sea of the pepoles unique improvement: House Boat
Peoples of the Sea unique unit: Nagato Class Battleship
Peoples of the Sea unique unit that replaces the Battleship. Stronger than the Normal Battleship.
